title: Chat App
description: A full-stack chat application built with Vue 3, Vuetify, Socket.io, Typescript, Node.js, and Express.js.
features: Real-time chat: Chat with other users in real-time.
Create, join, and leave rooms: Create, join, and leave rooms to chat with other users.
Admin messages: Admin messages are displayed when a user joins or leaves a room.
User activity: User activity is displayed when a user is typing.
how_to_use: Install server dependencies: `cd chat-app/server && npm install`
Install client dependencies: `cd chat-app/client && npm install`
Configure server environment variables: Rename `.env.example` to `.env` and update the necessary values.
Configure client environment variables: Rename `.env.local.example` to `.env.local` and update the necessary values.
Start the server development server: `npm run dev`
Start the client development server: `npm run dev`
Open your browser and visit `http://localhost:3000` to access Chat App.

title: facebook post clone
description: SPA application Clone facebook post function like interacting with posts by liking, commenting, deleting comment, deleting posts and creating posts with front-end technologies only using json server as mock database, design with responsive and dark mode with simple animations.
features: Interact with posts by [ like, comment, delete ] and single page for every post
Form for creating posts that contain user ( name, image ), post ( title, description, images )
Save unsent data in local storage
A random image containing a distinctive color and the first letter of the first and second name of the user who did not put a picture
Loading handler, error handler and 404 page
Compatible with all devices, browsers, search engines and screen readers
how_to_use: You Need To Setup [ nodejs, gulp ] on your machine
Install json-server [ npm install -g json-server ] - First Time Only
npm start or npm run start - on another terminal
notes: No live preview link because using json server as Database how to preview on github
If You Want To Add Image In Post All Images Must Be In public/images Folder
